Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Garfield and Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Cottage Grove due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Cottage Grove due to track conditions

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem and Ashland/63rd at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Garfield to Cottage Grove provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
